title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 6
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Football, remote controls, writing, the beach, snow, a hat, trains, soccer and Rosemary's babies
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Alan from Balwyn North talking about the Collingwood footy team; John from Port Melbourne chats about his cherished remote control; Susy of Beaumaris and Victoria from Elwood both have a passion for writing; Camile of Warburton just loves going to the beach; Jack loves the outdoors, skiing and building snowmen; Fiona from St Kilda has a favourite hat; Matthew and Michael favour trains and soccer; and Rosemary's favourite things are her five children.
